refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: To move the formal charge field of Atom and the get/setFormalCharge() methods to the AtomType class.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: A formal charge is something more related to an atom type than to an actual instance. The field will still be accesible from the Atom class too, because it inherits from AtomType. The move, however, will allow atom types to be described with a formal charge.
The problem that brought this forward, is the N4 atom type in the structgen atom type list (CVS 2003-10-01) which has a positive charge, but cannot be marked as such with the current API.
